article: Each person has his own way to have fun . Some like sports . Some like playing chess or cards . But a large number of people enjoy listening to music . Nowadays , music has become an important part of our life . We can listen to music on CDs , on radio or on TV . Also , we can search the Internet to find the song we like . It ' s the easiest way to enjoy the music that we like . Also we can download our favorite songs from the Internet for free . If we have a Walkman , we can hear music everywhere . It can give us pleasure if we are sad . It can cheer us up , too . When we are tired , it can make us relaxed . Different people like different kinds of music . Young people like pop music . Maybe old people like gentle and quiet music . Different music can express different feelings . When we are happy , we like to listen to jubilant music . When we are unhappy , we want to hear soft music . We need different kinds of music in different _ We can get different feelings from music . Music is the best friend of human beings . We ca n ' t imagine what life would be like without music .
